items.sentence: I asked the man at the door what his name was.
There could be no doubt as to who the man was.
The latter half of the game was very exciting.
This mountain has an altitude of 3,000 meters.
It means a lot to me to know you want to stay.
Tom was carrying his French textbook with him.
It isn't always so easy to do the right thing.
It isn't a Thanksgiving dinner without turkey.
Why don't we meet back here in thirty minutes?
Let's get out of here. Tom is going to see us.
